runs.task: Fix service worker stale file references
runs.details: Removed personalized-dashboard.js and event-filter.js from SW cache list (files don't exist). Bumped cache version to v10-cleanup.

Implemented the empty updateFilterCount() method to show a visible count of filtered events (e.g. '12 of 45 events'). Added #filterCount element and CSS to index.html. Count updates on filter toggle and initial load.
